name: Locical Block Fill
description:
Locical Block Fill is an addictive brick blast games that rediscover the fantistic joy of childhood you know and love

How to play
- Drag the blocks puzzle jewel to breakout.
- Put blocks all in the row or column, the blocks will be clear automatic and you get more points.

FEATURES
- Simple rules and Easy control
- Many new nice cubes
- Attractive effects and easy controls
